abstract: Profile of Maryland women's basketball team forward Kiah Gillespie, Connecticut native who was considered shoo-in for coach Geno Auriemma's University of Connecticut program; Gillepsie and Maryland have serious chance to prevent UConn from beating record 90-game winning streak they reached in 2010 when team's face off in upcoming game.
lead_paragraph: Kiah Gillespie, a high school star, was not chosen for her state’s juggernaut team, and went to Maryland. On Thursday the undefeated Huskies are coming to her new home in what could be a showdown.
snippet: Kiah Gillespie, a high school star, was not chosen for her state’s juggernaut team, and went to Maryland. On Thursday the undefeated Huskies are coming to her new home in what could be a showdown....

headline.main: A Terrapin From Connecticut Gets Her Shot at UConn
headline.print_headline: A Terrapin From Connecticut Gets Her Shot at UConn in a Clash of Unbeatens
